content: this hat is lovely to wear - super comfortable and soft the yarn is very pretty and unique with multiple colours - this makes it so much fun to work with that hat works up very quickly the pattern is fairly simple - so it makes a relaxing item to crochet please favorite and queue the design on ravelry if you make it i would love to see your finished photos and if you want to be featured in one of my weekly newsletters message me and let me know i will add an approved photo and link to you or your site/shop enjoy making and wearing this hat
